attributes.action: Hold a referendum on re-joining the EU on previous terms
attributes.additional_details: Public opinion has changed drastically and we suggest holding an online poll to find out if this nation firstly wants a referendum to ask the question, the results of this poll would oblige us to have a national referendum to decide if we ask to re-join our friends across the EU.
attributes.background: It is time that we ask people again if they would like to re-join the EU. Some in society have realised that they may have been mistaken, and that they may have been lied to.
